note.p: Birth: Yattendon Manor, Berkshire, England (04 August 1892)
Honours: MC 1916; KCB 1939; GCB 1944; GCVO 1946; Baron 1957; KG 1965
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1970 vol 16 pp 37-56, plate, by John Winnifrith
References: William McGucken, 'The Royal Society and the Genesis of the Scientific Advisory Committee to Britain's War Cabinet, 1939-1940' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 87-115
